data.text: Type in the missing letters to complete the sentence. Then click 'Submit'.
data.Question: The __________ dance is performed by male dancers carrying swords.
Bhangra is a popular dance of the __________ province of Pakistan.
The __________ is a folk dance of the Makranis of Balochistan.
__________ is a dance accompanied by the clapping of hands and beating drums.
The National Academy of Performing Arts is in __________.
Chughtai and Sadequain are famous __________.
Music which is produced by the human voice is called __________ music.
__________ Iqbal is a famous Urdu poet.
Shaukat __________ is a famous literary scholar of Pakistan.
Many Muslim artists believe that __________ is the mother of all arts.
data.feedback: Oh no! That's not correct! Try again.
